availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married to Julia A. Hills. Father of Thomas R. Hills. Cabinetmaker in Hardin County in 1860. Sheriff of Hardin County from 1864 to 1867.

ab.bibl:
"Hardin County Sheriff's," (http://www.hcky.org/hcso/History/PastSheriffs.htm) (accessed March 28, 2017).
_Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 3, p. 93.
Find A Grave, "James L. Hills (January 6, 1827-March 7, 1883)," Memorial #90448617, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90448617 (accessed March 28, 2017).
